format: 
    beamer:
        keep-tex: false
        cite-method: natbib
        include-in-header:

aspectratio: 169
fontsize: 12pt
fonttheme: professionalfonts
linkcolor: black
citecolor: airforceblue!110    # this color is defined in the header file

biblio-style: apalike
